name: RangeFormat
description: A format object encapsulating the range's font, fill, borders, alignment, and other properties.

properties.name: columnWidth
properties.description: Gets or sets the width of all colums within the range. If the column widths are not uniform, null will be returned.

properties.name: fill
properties.description: Returns the fill object defined on the overall range.

properties.name: borders
properties.description: Collection of border objects that apply to the overall range.

properties.name: font
properties.description: Returns the font object defined on the overall range.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the horizontal alignment for the specified object.

properties.name: rowHeight
properties.description: Gets or sets the height of all rows in the range. If the row heights are not uniform null will be returned.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the vertical alignment for the specified object.

properties.name: wrapText
properties.description: Indicates if Excel wraps the text in the object. A null value indicates that the entire range doesn't have uniform wrap setting

properties.name: protection
properties.description: Returns the format protection object for a range.

methods.name: autofitColumns
methods.description: Changes the width of the columns of the current range to achieve the best fit, based on the current data in the columns.

methods.name: autofitRows
methods.description: Changes the height of the rows of the current range to achieve the best fit, based on the current data in the columns.
